column1: # These are the mechanical parameters measured on fibers from the Turin Shroud
# collected during the 1978 STURP campaign (buttocks area).
# From sigma_R: 603 AD ± 69 years (68% CI) = 603 AD ± 138 years (95% CI)
# From E_m:     262 AD ± 102 years (68% CI) = 262 AD ± 204 years (95% CI)
# From eta_m:   -30 AD (30 BC) ± 298 years (68% CI) = 30 BC ± 596 years (95% CI)
# AVERAGE:      278 AD ± 108 years (68% CI) = 278 AD ± 216 years (95% CI)
# Previous result (Fanti et al. 2013): 400 AD ± 400 years (95% CI)
# Combined with Raman/FT-IR (Fanti et al. 2015): 90 AD ± 200 years (95% CI)
# 1988 Radiocarbon result: 1325 AD ± 65 years (95% CI) - INCOMPATIBLE
